imdb.plot outline: On Beats + Bites the Potash Twins introduce their famous collaborators to their food-forward world, bringing them along to experience the best eats on the road. Accomplished jazz musicians, foodies, and Bravoholics, the "Potash Twins" take viewers along as they rub elbows with artists, master chefs and Bravolebrities.
imdb.title: Beats + Bites with the Potash Twins
